wikipedia_page.main: Bouverie Francis Primrose McDonald LRCS, LRCP (13 April 1861 — 8 July 1931) was a British medical doctor and Conservative Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Wallasey in Cheshire from 1918 until 1922.
